text: Nishikant Kamat (17 June 1970 â€“ 17 August 2020) was an Indian filmmaker and actor. His first movie was Dombivali Fast. His best known movie was Evano Oruvan. An actor, he starred in Saatchya Aat Gharat and Rocky Handsome. He was born in Mumbai. Kamat died of cirrhosis on 17 August 2020 in Hyderabad at the age of 50. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from cirrhosis Category:Indian movie directors Category:Indian movie producers Category:Indian screenwriters Category:Indian movie actors Category:Actors from Mumbai
title: Nishikant Kamat
